name: To Mari, From the Deep
description:
Write a letter to a loved one.

This short game was designed for O2A2 (Again!) - A Visual Novel Jam.

FEATURES:
     Two choices
     Three endings
     Under 1000 words
     One custom musical track
     One illustration, fully unlocked at the end of the game

TEAM:
     Terra Babcock - Story dev, writing, programming
     Johan Faulstich - Story dev, illustration, editing
     Michael Cooper - Original soundtrack

Follow the devs on twitter at FiendishFiction

Play our other free release, Up All Night
